reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: GTK/Strengthening the mastering of natural resources

description.narrative: The Geological Survey of Finland implements in Tajikistan a project with the national institution (years 2014 - 2017) in which the overall objective is to improve the standards and living conditions for local people by strengthening of the national economy of Tajikistan through sustainable use of mineral resources and creating of a safer environment. The project aims at developing the capacity for better risk management of geo-hazards modern data collection storage and dissemination and monitoring of ground water resources.The primary beneficiary is the national geo-institution other beneficiaries include governmental institutions and agencies on both the national and regional level.The project is carried out as assingment for the services of governmental au thorities/institutions.The support is 1.635.000 Euros.
